name: Return the Account Ledger for for an NSC and Account having not logged in

testSteps.description: Given I have not logged into the API
And I have not located a customer

When I search for for the details of the following SEPA Direct Debit:
| nsc | account | uniqueMandateReferenceNumber | sepaOIN |
| 931012 | 15507009 | 654654694 | IE52SDD300378 |

children.description: Get sepa direct debit details: 931012, 15507009, 654654694, IE52SDD300378

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

userStory.storyName: View Details of a Direct Debit
